This well endowed property is mostly flat, forested with a mix of hard and softwood trees, a variety of sandy and graveled areas, and is surrounded on three sides by the glacier fed Squamish River, which is home to late running winter steelhead and four species of Pacific Salmon: Chinook, Coho, Cham and Pinks. There are resident and sea running Dolly varden cutthroat trout and a few rainbow trout. Want to get away from it all, but not drive all day to get there?

Public Remarks: Spacious one owner home looking for another family to enjoy all it has to offer, and there is plenty here for the entire family! 5400 sf home on a gorgeous 16,000 sf south side lot with 180 degree views in a prime Upper Dundarave cu-de-sac. Spacious 2200 sf main floor opens out to a huge 44’ x 20’ deck complete with hot tub, looking out to the stunning views and overlooks the beautifully landscaped backyard complete with a large infinity edge pool for those sunny day dips to cool off! Four huge bedrooms upstairs including a deluxe master with a six piece ensuite. Fully finished lower level is walkout to the pool and patios with a fifth bedroom, rec room, sun room, wine cellar and storage. Beautifully maintained and all within a short walk to schools, shops and restaurants of Dundarave.

Public Remarks: Majestic ocean views!  This elegant and well maintained home sits on an 15,690 sqft lot in the coveted University Endowment Lands overlooking the Georgia Straight. Upstairs holds 4 bedrooms including a large Master with sundeck to take advantage of the views. Main floor features an updated kitchen with breakfast nook, cozy library and grand living and dining room which opens onto a back porch over looking the rear garden. A large stone patio sits among the mature landscaping and water feature making it a perfect place to dine al fresco and watch the sunset over the ocean.  Truly a rare offering.

Public Remarks: Rarely available 90 ACRE Farm property located on King George Blvd, which is the largest piece of Farm land available on King George! Strategic location provides quick and easy access to Highway #99, South Surrey and the US Border. The property offers 3 road frontages off of King George Blvd (1300 feet), 40th Avenue and 44th Avenue. Fertile soil suitable to grow various types of crops, fruits and vegetable and great potential to start a large scale Agri-Business operation. City water and a newer drilled well available. 3.75 acres are currently being used to grow specialty Aronia berries. Also, included are three large barns and a 4 bdrm and two bath home. Foreign purchaser tax doesn't apply. Call today to book your private viewing!

Public Remarks: This Rockland Mansion is a magnificent luxury heritage home in 1st Shaughnessy. It boasts beautiful handcrafted oak and mahogany design details and has been lovingly restored, emphasizing its heritage features. Triple paned glass has vastly mitigated outside noise and the windows feature remote controlled coverings. High end appliances include SubZero, Miele and Wolf. Upgraded wiring, plumbing, heating & Air Conditioning. Great for entertaining with a large media room and wine cellar. Its has a beautiful sun room with many refinements that yields views of the spectacular surrounding grounds. There are 3 entrances and the zoning allows for additional homes to be built and many more opportunities. To find out more please call today!
Realtor Remarks: Stunning Home with infill capabilities. Carriage home is perfect for guests. Significant price drop! Buyer's Realtor must physically introduce clients to property and be psychically present otherwise only $1000 remuneration.
